strings.schematron.title: HNAP validation rules - multilingual
strings.MetadataStandardName: Value is not valid for Metadata Standard Name, should be 'North American Profile of ISO 19115:2003 - Geographic information - Metadata' in english and 'Profil nord-américain de la norme ISO 19115:2003 - Information géographique - Métadonnées' in french
strings.OrganisationNameThesaurus: Thesaurus organization name is required in both languages
strings.MapServicesLanguage: For online resources map services (OGC:WMS, Esri REST: Map Service protocols) the language attribute is required
strings.MetadataTitle: Title is required in both languages
strings.MetadataAbstract: Abstract is required in both languages
strings.ContactGovEnglish: English value for Contact - Organisation name in 'Goverment of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.ContactGovFrench: French value for Contact - Organisation name in 'Goverment of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.ContactGovAllowedEnglish: English value for Contact - Organisation name must be one of 'Government of Canada', 'Government of Alberta', 'Government of British Columbia', 'Government of Ontario', 'Government of Nova Scotia', 'Government of Prince Edward Island' or 'Government of Newfoundland and Labrador'.
strings.ContactGovAllowedFrench: French value for Contact - Organisation name must be one of 'Gouvernement du Canada', 'Gouvernement de l'Alberta', 'Gouvernement de la Colombie-Britannique', 'Gouvernement de l'Ontario', 'Gouvernement de la Nouvelle-Écosse', 'Gouvernement de l'Île-du-Prince-Édouard' or 'Gouvernement de Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador'.
strings.CitedResponsibleContactGovEnglish: English value for Cited Responsible Contact - Organisation name in 'Goverment of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.CitedResponsibleContactGovFrench: French value for Cited Responsible Contact - Organisation name in 'Goverment of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.CitedResponsibleContactGovAllowedEnglish: English value for Cited Responsible Contact - Organisation name must be one of 'Government of Canada', 'Government of Alberta', 'Government of British Columbia', 'Government of Ontario', 'Government of Nova Scotia', 'Government of Prince Edward Island' or 'Government of Newfoundland and Labrador'.
strings.CitedResponsibleContactGovAllowedFrench: French value for Cited Responsible Contact - Organisation name must be one of 'Gouvernement du Canada', 'Gouvernement de l'Alberta', 'Gouvernement de la Colombie-Britannique', 'Gouvernement de l'Ontario', 'Gouvernement de la Nouvelle-Écosse', 'Gouvernement de l'Île-du-Prince-Édouard' or 'Gouvernement de Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador'.
strings.DistributorGovEnglish: English value for Distributor Contact - Organisation name in 'Goverment of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.DistributorGovFrench: French value for Distributor Contact - Organisation name in 'Goverment of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.DistributorGovAllowedEnglish: English value for Distributor Contact - Organisation name must be one of 'Government of Canada', 'Government of Alberta', 'Government of British Columbia', 'Government of Ontario', 'Government of Nova Scotia', 'Government of Prince Edward Island' or 'Government of Newfoundland and Labrador'.
strings.DistributorGovAllowedFrench: French value for Distributor Contact - Organisation name must be one of 'Gouvernement du Canada', 'Gouvernement de l'Alberta', 'Gouvernement de la Colombie-Britannique', 'Gouvernement de l'Ontario', 'Gouvernement de la Nouvelle-Écosse', 'Gouvernement de l'Île-du-Prince-Édouard' or 'Gouvernement de Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador'.
strings.OpenLicense: An Open Goverment Licence is required. Accepted English values: Open Government Licence - Canada (http://open.canada.ca/en/open-government-licence-canada) or Open Government Licence – Newfoundland and Labrador (https://opendata.gov.nl.ca/public/opendata/page/?page-id=licence) or Open Government Licence – Nova Scotia (https://novascotia.ca/opendata/licence.asp) or Open Government Licence – Ontario (https://www.ontario.ca/page/open-government-licence-ontario) or Open Government Licence – Prince Edward Island (https://www.princeedwardisland.ca/en/information/finance/open-government-licence-prince-edward-island) or Open Government Licence - British Columbia (https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content/data/open-data/open-government-licence-bc) or Open Government Licence - Alberta (https://open.alberta.ca/licence). Accepted French values : Licence du gouvernement ouvert - Canada (http://ouvert.canada.ca/fr/licence-du-gouvernement-ouvert-canada) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert – Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador (https://opendata.gov.nl.ca/public/opendata/page/?page-id=licence) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert – Nouvelle-Écosse (https://novascotia.ca/opendata/licence.asp) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert – Ontario (https://www.ontario.ca/fr/page/licence-du-gouvernement-ouvert-ontario) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert – Île-du-Prince-Édouard (https://www.princeedwardisland.ca/fr/information/finances/licence-du-gouvernement-ouvert-ile-du-prince-edouard) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert - Colombie-Britannique (https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content/data/open-data/open-government-licence-bc) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert - Alberta (https://open.alberta.ca/licence)
strings.SupplementalInfo: Supplemental Information should be empty or filled in both languages
strings.Keyword: Keyword is required in both languages
strings.OtherConstraintsNote2: Note (Other Constraints) is required in both languages
strings.ResourceDescription: Online resource description is not valid. The format should be: ContentType;Format;Lang
strings.ResourceDescriptionContentType: Online resource description content type is not valid. Valid values are: Web Service,Service Web,Dataset,Données,API,Application,Supporting Document,Document de soutien
strings.ResourceDescriptionFormat: Online resource description format is not valid. Valid values are:
strings.ResourceDescriptionLanguage: Online resource description language is not valid. Should be a comma separated values of ISO-LANG-3 codes
strings.SecurityLevel: Security User Note is not valid. Valid values are:
strings.OtherConstraintsNote: If you indicate 'Other Restrictions' in the 'Access Constraints' or 'Use Constraints' fields, the other constraints for accessing or using the resource should be explained here.
strings.UseLimitation: Value is required for Use Limitation in both languages
strings.ContactOrganisationName: Contact - Organization name is required in both languages
strings.CitedResponsiblePartyOrganisationName: Cited Responsible Party - Organization name is required in both languages
strings.DistributorOrganisationName: Distributor - Organization name is required in both languages
strings.ContactPositionName: Contact - Position Name should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.CitedResponsiblePartyPositionName: Cited Responsible Party - Position Name should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.DistributorPositionName: Distributor - Position Name should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.ContactElectronicMail: Contact - Electronic mail address is required in both languages
strings.CitedResponsiblePartyElectronicMail: Cited Responsible Party - Electronic mail address is required in both languages
strings.DistributorElectronicMail: Distributor - Electronic mail address is required in both languages
strings.ContactHoursOfService: Contact - Hours of service should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.CitedResponsiblePartyHoursOfService: Cited Responsible Party - Hours of service should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.DistributorHoursOfService: Distributor - Hours of service should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.ContactDeliveryPoint: Contact - Delivery Point should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.CitedResponsiblePartyDeliveryPoint: Cited Responsible Party - Delivery Point should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.DistributorDeliveryPoint: Distributor - Delivery Point should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.ContactPhone: Contact - Phone should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.CitedResponsiblePartyPhone: Cited Responsible Party - Phone should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.DistributorPhone: Distributor - Phone should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.ECCountry: Country should have a value as defined in the ISO 3166 code list. See https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#search/code/
strings.ECThesaurusOrg: Thesaurus cited responsible party organisation is required
strings.ECThesaurusRole: Thesaurus cited responsible party role is required
strings.ECThesaurusEmail: Thesaurus cited responsible party email is required
